displayName.text: Howard Berman DMD & Robert I. Schwartz DMD

formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S #14C, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S #14C, New York, NY 10019-1679, USA

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Sherman for a regular checkup and cleaning. She is a smart and thoughtful doctor, and has a very good bedside manner. She calmly and clearly answered all my questions and took a gum scan when I expressed concern about receding. I also had to miss an appointment due to a family emergency, and because I had never done that before they waived the no show fee as a one time courtesy, which I very much appreciated. I gave only 4 stars because I had to wait 15 minutes (I was the first appointment but didn’t seem like anybody was there when I arrived), and because the hygienist was a little rough. Overall very good place.

originalText.text: Nightmare of my filling. Did one filling, felt that it is too sensitive to chew a chip afterwards. Went back, Dr. Park fixed the shape and got slightly better. It became vert sensitive to the cold where it cannot touch cold water at all. Got hypersensitive as time went by and went back to Dr. Park again who did the dental bonding. Didn’t work still hypersensitive AND somehow the local injection site that the needle touched is giving me excruciating pain RIGHT NOW. I don’t think her techniques are good. I have two stars one for front desk there is a young lady really nice. One for hygienist a blonde lady who is super helpful

originalText.text: The quality of the work done my Dr. Berman and Dr. Leder was excellent.  I highly recommend using them if you have needed dental work and implants!

text.text: The quality of the work done my Dr. Berman and Dr. Leder was excellent.  I highly recommend using them if you have needed dental work and implants!

originalText.text: This is an excellent dental office.  Dentists vary but are good. Dr, Sherman is wonderful. Support staff is consistent and accommodating.

text.text: This is an excellent dental office.  Dentists vary but are good. Dr, Sherman is wonderful. Support staff is consistent and accommodating.

originalText.text: Dr. Berman's office always treats me with  the utmost professional expertise and courtesy. They are very sensitive to individual circumstances and support and solve any and all issues that may arise.
